scripts.pre-release: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.tag:create: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: prepare release" && git tag "v$(node -pe "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre-release && npm run version:patch && npm run tag:create && npm run tag:push
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && npm run version:minor && npm run tag:create && npm run tag:push
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && npm run version:major && npm run tag:create && npm run tag:push
